title: North Korea's Kim Jong Un leaves for China by armoured train
summary: North Korea's Kim arrives in Beijing with daughter and possible heir. Kim is in China to attend a "Victory Day" parade on Wednesday. He will rub shoulders with China's President Xi Jinping, Russia's Vladimir Putin and other world leaders.

title: Govt takes a u-turn on links with Turkish aviation sector
summary: India's largest carrier IndiGo secured approval to extend a leasing agreement for two Boeing 777 aircraft with Turkish Airlines by six months. Government officials said the approvals were given to safeguard the interest of homegrown airlines. In May, the Bureau of Civil Aviation Security (BCAS) revoked clearance of Turkish ground handling firm Celebi.

title: AIBOT Expands Manufacturing to UAS Center at San Bernardino International Airport; Prepares for Official Unveiling at Commercial UAV Expo 2025
summary: AIBOT has selected the UAS Center at SBD as the location for its drone manufacturing operations. The move positions AIBOT to scale production while strengthening its California-based foundation for future UAV innovation. The company will host its official unveiling event at the Commercial UAV Expo 2025 on September 2.
